data.name: RTK13 - Additional Officer Data - Legendary Officers Set ② 追加武将データ 古武将セット②
data.detailed_description:
12 legendary officers will be added.

▼Additional Officers
Tian Ji/ Pang Juan / Sun Bin / Wu Qi / Zou Ji / Tian Yinqi / Jī Ping / Guo Wei / Ju Xin / Yue Yi / Tian Dan / Lu Shang

▼To Use
Select a scenario in the "MAIN MODE" using "SELECT SCENARIO." Under "MANAGE ORIGINAL OFFICERS" select legendary officers from "ALLOW ORIGINAL OFFICERS TO APPEAR."
Following this, you will be able to use this character in the MAIN MODE.
data.about_the_game:
12 legendary officers will be added.

▼Additional Officers
Tian Ji/ Pang Juan / Sun Bin / Wu Qi / Zou Ji / Tian Yinqi / Jī Ping / Guo Wei / Ju Xin / Yue Yi / Tian Dan / Lu Shang

▼To Use
Select a scenario in the "MAIN MODE" using "SELECT SCENARIO." Under "MANAGE ORIGINAL OFFICERS" select legendary officers from "ALLOW ORIGINAL OFFICERS TO APPEAR."
Following this, you will be able to use this character in the MAIN MODE.

fullgame.name: ROMANCE OF THE THREE KINGDOMS XIII / 三國志13

data.supported_languages:
Japanese*, Traditional Chinese*, Korean, English
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows® 10, Windows® 8, Windows® 8.1, Windows® 7, Windows® Vista
  • Processor: Pentium®4 1.6GHz or over
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1024×768 over or 1280×720 over display
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 7 GB available space
  • Sound Card: 16 bit stereo, 48KHz WAVE file can be played
  • Additional Notes: Shader model: Version 3.0, VRAM: 256MB over
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows® 10, Windows® 8, Windows® 8.1, Windows® 7, Windows® Vista
  • Processor: Core2 Duo 2.0GHz or over
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1024×768 over or 1280×720 over display
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 7 GB available space
  • Sound Card: 16 bit stereo, 48KHz WAVE file can be played
  • Additional Notes: Shader model: Version 3.0, VRAM: 512MB over
